title: Exercise 3.8: Read temperature-density data
description: Implement readTempDenFile(filename) to return (temperatures, densities) lists and create temp_air_list, dens_air_list, temp_water_list, dens_water_list.
hints: Skip lines starting with # and blank lines.
Split by whitespace and convert the two columns to floats.
Return two lists and also populate the four global lists.
